metadata.synopsis: The Emperor is angry that you didn't follow their instructions, and ate the mind flayer brain after helping to feed it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_MAIN_ATeleport to S_WYR_Windmill_MF and help the mind flayer feed.Then help the mind flayer or use "oe Windmill_MF_Helped" in ReCon to skip the quest.Kill the mindflayer and have an Illithid character eat the brain

0.text: It's no good - it won't be any use now. It's overripened thanks to your feeding.
